          <title>
            <string language="fr">Rayonnement à travers les cellules de peau</string>
            <string language="en">Radiation through the skin cells</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Strahlung durch die Hautzellen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Radiação através das pilhas da pele</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Radiazione attraverso le cellule della pelle</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ακτινοβολία μέσω των κυττάρων δερμάτων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Radiación a través de las células de la piel</string>
          </title>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <description>
            <string language="fr">Cette illustration compare la transmission de  différents types de rayonnement par les cellules de peau.</string>
            <string language="en">This illustration compares the transmission of different types of radiation through the skin cells.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">rayonnement d'alpha</string>
            <string language="en">alpha radiation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">rayonnements bêta</string>
            <string language="en">beta radiation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">rayonnement gamma</string>
            <string language="en">gamma radiation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">cellules vivantes</string>
            <string language="en">living cells</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">radionucléide</string>
            <string language="en">radionuclide</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">peau</string>
            <string language="en">skin</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung vergleicht die Übertragung der 
unterschiedlichen Typen der Strahlung durch die Hautzellen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração compara a transmissão de tipos
diferentes de radiação através das pilhas da pele.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione confronta la trasmissione 
dei tipi differenti di radiazioni attraverso le cellule della pelle.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση συγκρίνει τη μετάδοση των 
διαφορετικών τύπων ακτινοβολιών μέσω των κυττάρων δερμάτων.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración compara la transmisión de 
diversos tipos de radiación a través de las células de la piel.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Alphastrahlung</string>
